setting.title: ledgervoucher
setting.columnlabels: Voucher No,Reference No,Voucher Date,Total Amount,Narration,Ledger,Voucher Type,Adjustment Method,Payment Mode,Cheque No,Amount Paid,Balance Amount,Dr Amount,Cr Amount,Module,Module Id
setting.query:
select * from ( select ledgervoucher_ledgervoucherid,MIN(ledgervoucher_voucherno) as ledgervoucher_voucherno, MIN(ledgervoucher_referenceno) as ledgervoucher_referenceno, MIN(ledgervoucher_voucherdate) as ledgervoucher_voucherdate,MIN(accountvouchertype_vouchertype) as accountvouchertype_vouchertype, dbo.GetDrByVoucher($FORM_txtledgerid$,ledgervoucher_ledgervoucherid) as ledgervoucher_dramount, dbo.GetCrByVoucher($FORM_txtledgerid$,ledgervoucher_ledgervoucherid) as ledgervoucher_cramount, CASE WHEN $FORM_txtledgerid$ = MIN(ledgervoucher_ledgerid) THEN (SELECT ledger_ledgername FROM tbl_ledger l1 JOIN tbl_accountvoucherbreakup ON accountvoucherbreakup_ledgerid=l1.ledger_ledgerid WHERE ISNULL(accountvoucherbreakup_isparent,0) = 1 AND accountvoucherbreakup_ledgervoucherid = MIN(ledgervoucher_ledgervoucherid)) ELSE (SELECT ledger_ledgername FROM tbl_ledger l2 WHERE l2.ledger_ledgerid = MIN(ledgervoucher_ledgerid)) END as ledgervoucher_particulars from tbl_accountvoucherbreakup JOIN tbl_ledgervoucher ON accountvoucherbreakup_ledgervoucherid=ledgervoucher_ledgervoucherid JOIN tbl_accountvouchertype ON accountvouchertype_accountvouchertypeid=ledgervoucher_accountvouchertypeid WHERE accountvoucherbreakup_ledgerid=$FORM_txtledgerid$ DATEBETWEEN(ledgervoucher_voucherdate,$FORM_txtVoucherDate_From$,$FORM_txtVoucherDate_To$) GROUP BY ledgervoucher_ledgervoucherid )r1
$Search$
